meanings.definition: A device used in photography that produces a brief, intense flash of light.
meanings.sent1: The photographer attached the flashbulb to the camera to capture the perfect picture.
meanings.sent2: The old camera needed a new flashbulb to take clear photos.
meanings.sent3: When the flashbulb refused to light up, the photographer had to resort to natural lighting.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a flashbulb, brightening up the room instantly.
meanings.sent5: The flashbulb illuminated the dark room, revealing hidden details.
